unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Binomial Applications
question_text: A student is taking a $10\text{ question}$ multiple choice test that has five options for each question (A, B, C, D, and E). Suppose a student knows the correct answer to $6$ of the questions. For the remaining $4\text{ questions}$ , the student can eliminate one response per question, on average. What is the probability the student gets at least an $80\%$ on the test?
